testdata/multiple_files/c.txt	Page: 0

#include <iostream>

int main() {
    std::ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    std::cin.tie(nullptr);




testdata/multiple_files/c.txt	Page: 1


    std::cout << "Hello, World!\n";

    return 0;
}
